blog.name: pokemon-professor-sakura
blog.title: Asks: CLOSED! Submissions: OPEN!
blog.description:
(This is a roleplay blog run by @chickadee567)

((Talking out of character))

Hello there! I’m Professor Sakura, and I’m always willing

to help trainers and caretakers with their Pokemon.

You can ask me about Pokemon behavior, where certain Pokemon can be found,

and even report sightings of rare or mythical Pokemon.

((Search for the tag #rules to find rules for asks and submissions!))

summary: It is purple with pink eye lids and it has some whiteish  colored markings
question: It is purple with pink eye lids and it has some whiteish  colored markings
answer:
I think that might be a Purrloin.

  • Purrloin are carnivores.
  • Like all cat Pokemon, they like being in small spaces. You should have some boxes for them to hide in.
  • They like to use their cuteness as a distraction to steal things. Teach them that this isn’t okay so you don’t end up having something stolen.
  • They like dark places, so you should have a dark area for them to sleep in.
  • Their fur is short and only needs to be washed and brushed once a week.

- Professor Sakura

reblog.comment:
I think that might be a Purrloin.

  • Like all cat Pokemon, they like being in small spaces. You should have some boxes for them to hide in.
  • They like to use their cuteness as a distraction to steal things. Teach them that this isn’t okay so you don’t end up having something stolen.
  • They like dark places, so you should have a dark area for them to sleep in.
  • Their fur is short and only needs to be washed and brushed once a week.

- Professor Sakura

trail.content_raw:
I think that might be a Purrloin.

  • Purrloin are carnivores.
  • Like all cat Pokemon, they like being in small spaces. You should have some boxes for them to hide in.
  • They like to use their cuteness as a distraction to steal things. Teach them that this isn’t okay so you don’t end up having something stolen.
  • They like dark places, so you should have a dark area for them to sleep in.
  • Their fur is short and only needs to be washed and brushed once a week.

- Professor Sakura
trail.content:
I think that might be a Purrloin.

  • Purrloin are carnivores.
  • Like all cat Pokemon, they like being in small spaces. You should have some boxes for them to hide in.
  • They like to use their cuteness as a distraction to steal things. Teach them that this isn’t okay so you don’t end up having something stolen.
  • They like dark places, so you should have a dark area for them to sleep in.
  • Their fur is short and only needs to be washed and brushed once a week.

- Professor Sakura

summary: Took myself out for dinner and now I'm back home. Before I went out I thought I'd go nuts if I didn't get out of the house. But...
caption:
Took myself out for dinner and now I’m back home. Before I went out I thought I’d go nuts if I didn’t get out of the house. But now that I’m home it feels so good to be here with my cat and games. I can’t decide if I wanna play more God of War or more Persona 5, but in all reality I’m probably just gonna play more Overwatch. 💜🐱💚🎮💙 #3ds #nintendo #gamer #gamergirl #gaming #gamerkitty #cat #catstagram #blackcatsofinstagram #switch #playstation
https://www.instagram.com/p/Bx0tfvznSNA/?igshid=1f97nmszcc0v4

summary: So i didn't have a pokemon when i fell asleep when i woke up there was a purple cat pokemon on my bed it looked pretty skinny so...
question: So i didn't have a pokemon when i fell asleep when i woke up there was a purple cat pokemon on my bed it looked pretty skinny so im feeding it some berries it looks happy can you tell me what pokemon what pokemon is it and how do i take care of it?
answer:
There’s a few cat Pokemon what are purple. Could you be a little more specific? Are there any markings on their fur?

- Professor Sakura

reblog.comment:
There’s a few cat Pokemon what are purple. Could you be a little more specific? Are there any markings on their fur?

- Professor Sakura

trail.content_raw:
There’s a few cat Pokemon what are purple. Could you be a little more specific? Are there any markings on their fur?

- Professor Sakura
trail.content:

- Professor Sakura

title: Oninaki Para Nintendo Switch Y El Uso De Los Daemons #Nintendo #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Oninaki
body:
Oninaki Para Nintendo Switch Y El Uso De Los Daemons #Nintendo #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Oninaki

A través de un nuevo tráiler le damos un vistazo a los Daemons, poderosas almas perdidas que nos ayudan en Oninaki para Nintendo Switch.

Esta semana, Square Enix compartió un nuevo tráiler e información acerca de Oninaki para Nintendo Switch. En esta ocasión relacionada a uno de los aspectos de este juego de Tokyo RPG Factory, los Daemons. ¿Qué son estos seres? En el mundo de esta aventura se…

blog.description:
(This is a roleplay blog run by @chickadee567)

((Search for the tag #rules to find rules for asks and submissions!))

summary: So what was the first pokemon you ever caught? Have you ever lost any of your pokemon before?
question: So what was the first pokemon you ever caught? Have you ever lost any of your pokemon before?
answer:
The first Pokemon I caught was a Sentret. I caught it when I was….10, I think. And yes, I’ve lost a Pokemon before. I was at a mall with Sleipnir when he was a Servine and we got separated.

- Professor Sakura

That was an…unpleasant experience.

- Sleipnir the Serperior

summary: SEGA: "The Intro Cutscene Was Removed From The Switch Build Of Team Sonic Racing Due To The Cartridge Size Restrictions"
title: SEGA: "The Intro Cutscene Was Removed From The Switch Build Of Team Sonic Racing Due To The Cartridge Size Restrictions"
body:
SEGA: “The Intro Cutscene Was Removed From The Switch Build Of Team Sonic Racing Due To The Cartridge Size Restrictions”

If you play Team Sonic Racing on your Nintendo Switch, you may have noticed that the game doesn’t have an opening cutscene. According to SEGA, this was intentional. Other versions of the game have the cutscene, but SEGA told USGamer that “the intro cutscene was removed from Switch build of Team Sonic Racing due to the cartridge size restrictions. At this time, there are no plans to add the…

View On WordPress

body:
Apex Legends Para Nintendo Switch: ¿Te Sigo Y Me Sigues? #Nintendo #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #ApexLegends

¿Un indicio acerca del próximo anuncio de Apex Legends para Nintendo Switch? Doug Bowser y Kirk Scott ahora siguen al CEO de Respawn Entertainment.

Esto podría no significar nada, pero a la vez, significarlo todo. Pero alguien se percató recientemente que las cuentas en Twitter de Doug Bowser (@thetruebowser), actual presidente de Nintendo de América, y Kirk Scott (@Kirk_Scott), el encargado…

tags: Heroine Anthem Zero ya está disponible en Switch y iOS
summary: Heroine Anthem Zero ya está disponible en Switch y iOS
title: Heroine Anthem Zero ya está disponible en Switch y iOS
body:
Heroine Anthem Zero comienza con el joven Forest Keeper Wanin, una niña errante de Gon Arrue llamada Shama y una bruja roja que tendrían al mundo como su enemigo. Y así el entrelazamiento de destinos. Nos contará los orígenes de los Fae y los Sarem, y la leyenda de Wassernixe. Heroine Anthem Zero es un […]

La entrada Heroine Anthem Zero ya está disponible en Switch y iOS aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..

summary: It's almost the weekend, and a long one at that! We here at Faerie Park Campground are inviting you all to our Memorial Day...
body:
It’s almost the weekend, and a long one at that! We here at Faerie Park Campground are inviting you all to our Memorial Day Picnic that runs from today (5/23) to Monday evening (5/27)!

We’ve brought back our giant faerie flower, as well as the cotton candy cloud! We’ve also added some playground equipment, a picnic area and our rose petal stage! Come visit on Saturday evening to see our new picnic spot! There’s something for everyone! So be sure to stop by!!! 🇺🇸☺️🙂🧚🧚💛💛💛❤️💛💙
